name: dfmt
description: Dfmt is a formatter for D source code
preGenerateCommands: rdmd --eval="auto dir=environment.get(\"DUB_PACKAGE_DIR\"); dir.buildPath(\"bin\").mkdirRecurse; auto gitVer = (\"git -C \"~dir~\" describe --tags\").executeShell; (gitVer.status == 0 ? gitVer.output.strip : \"v\" ~ dir.dirName.baseName.findSplitAfter(environment.get(\"DUB_ROOT_PACKAGE\")~\"-\")[1]).ifThrown(\"0.0.0\").chain(newline).to!string.toFile(dir.buildPath(\"bin\", \"dubhash.txt\"));"
